name: Epic Bug Hunter
description: This player is an epic bug hunter. Epic bug hunters have found a lot of bugs and have helped getting them solved.

name: Bug Hunter
description: This player is a bug hunter. Bug hunters are active in the Discord Wolvesville Tester Club and/or help developers with tracking down hard to find bugs.

name: Epic Designer
description: This player is an epic designer who has created a lot of different outfits for Wolvesville.

name: Designer
description: This player is a designer for Wolvesville who has created outfits which are available in the app.

name: Epic Guardian
description: This player is an epic guardian. Epic guardians have helped the community for a long time by guarding against abusive players.

name: Guardian
description: This player is a guardian. Guardians read reports submitted by other players and remove abusive players from the game.

name: Mentor
description: This player is a mentor. Mentors answer questions and help players via the help chat.

name: Moderator
description: This player is a Discord moderator who helps manage the Discord community.

name: Epic Translator
description: This player is an epic translator of Wolvesville. Epic translators have translated a very large amount of the app.

name: Translator
description: This player is a translator of Wolvesville.

name: Wiki editor
description: This player has contributed to the Wolvesville wiki.

name: Early Bird
description: {unknown}

name: Loyalty
description: {unknown}

name: Epic Mentor
description: This player is an epic mentor. Epic mentors have helped the community for a long time and have answered hundreds of questions.

name: Social Media Manager
description: This player is part of the official Wolvesville social media team (Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Instagram).

name: Sound effects
description: This player either created music for the game or contributed by creating or suggesting an awesome sound effect in the Discord #sound-ideas channel, which was then added to the game.

name: Tags
description: {unknown}

name: Famous on Facebook
description: This player posted about Wolvesville on Facebook and received 1000 likes or more!

name: Famous on Instagram
description: This player posted about Wolvesville on Instagram and received 1000 likes or more!

name: Famous on Reddit
description: {unknown}

name: Instagram
description: This player has helped to contribute to Wolvesville on Instagram.

name: Famous on Twitter
description: This player tweeted about Wolvesville on Twitter and received 1000 likes or more!

name: YouTuber
description: This player is a YouTuber who has created a video about Wolvesville with a lot of views.
